The mnemonic is dot separated strings.

### printCustomPseudoSourceValue() {#ac7f9e48c43ea5f9f37fee565d0a18b36}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::MIRFormatter::printCustomPseudoSourceValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleslottracker">ModuleSlotTracker</a> &amp; MST, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudosourcevalue">PseudoSourceValue</a> &amp; PSV) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Implement target specific printing of target custom pseudo source value.

Default implementation is not necessarily the correct MIR serialization format.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/mirformatter-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/mirformatter-h">MIRFormatter.h</a>.

### printImm() {#aab0de54b603828aac17031e3d6c8ce17}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::MIRFormatter::printImm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; OpIdx, int64&#95;t Imm) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Implement target specific printing for machine operand immediate value, so that we can have more meaningful mnemonic than a 64-bit integer.

Passing std::nullopt to OpIdx means the index is unknown.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/mirformatter-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/mirformatter-h">MIRFormatter.h</a>.

for parsing IR value for custom pseudo source value.
